feed.title: Iotlist
feed.subtitle: The list for the Internet of Things

entry.title: Breeze: Wireless breathalyzer
entry.content: Breezee is a simple idea that could have a great impact. It would be great if it was connected to your car and locked the doors for 24hrs and ordered you a Uber when you were over the limit. It will be awesome when IoT product deliver a complete connected experience based on an initial set of data.
entry.summary: Breezee is a simple idea that could have a great impact. It would be great if it was connected to your car and locked the doors for 24hrs and ordered you a Uber when you were over the limit. It will be awesome when IoT product deliver a complete connected experience based on an initial set of data.

entry.title: Eero: Wifi system for your home
entry.content: Eero is the world’s first WiFi system. A set of three eeros covers the typical home. They work in unison to deliver hyper-fast, super-stable WiFi to every nook of every room. This is an interesting product because of the need for universal connectivity to enable the smart home. It would be interesting if they added sensors to the feature set as well.
entry.summary: Eero is the world’s first WiFi system. A set of three eeros covers the typical home. They work in unison to deliver hyper-fast, super-stable WiFi to every nook of every room. This is an interesting product because of the need for universal connectivity to enable the smart home. It would be interesting if they added sensors to the feature set as well.

entry.title: Luna: Turn your bed into a smartbed
entry.content: Luna is a pretty cool product that turns your ben into a smart bed. It intelligently manages your bed temperature, tracks sleep, and makes your bed smart.
entry.summary: Luna is a pretty cool product that turns your ben into a smart bed. It intelligently manages your bed temperature, tracks sleep, and makes your bed smart.

entry.title: Lockitron Bolt: Smart Lock
entry.content: Bolt is the latest smart lock from Lockitron. The design has been updated and they have also introduced the Lockitron bridge which will allow you to control your lock from anywhere in the world. Overall the smart lock market is starting to really heat up and we are seeing more Bluetooth options come to the market.
entry.summary: Bolt is the latest smart lock from Lockitron. The design has been updated and they have also introduced the Lockitron bridge which will allow you to control your lock from anywhere in the world. Overall the smart lock market is starting to really heat up and we are seeing more Bluetooth options come to the market.

entry.title: Pulse: LED light + wireless speakers
entry.content: Pluse is a smart bulb that has a JBL multi-channel stereo wireless speaker hidden within. You can simply screw the bulb into your existing lamp socket and control with your iOS or Android device. This is a great idea for those who rent and want to save space and create a modular smart home.
entry.summary: Pluse is a smart bulb that has a JBL multi-channel stereo wireless speaker hidden within. You can simply screw the bulb into your existing lamp socket and control with your iOS or Android device. This is a great idea for those who rent and want to save space and create a modular smart home.

entry.title: NEEO: Smart home remote
entry.content: NEEO is a smart home automation system. It’s the simplest way to connect and control all the devices in your home.
entry.summary: NEEO is a smart home automation system. It’s the simplest way to connect and control all the devices in your home.

entry.title: OpenSprinkler: Automate your sprinklers
entry.content: Keeping your lawn and flowers beautiful doesn't have to be stressful. OpenSprinkler unchains you from your sprinkler or irrigation control box, enabling you to program, run, or stop zones at any time from anywhere.
entry.summary: Keeping your lawn and flowers beautiful doesn't have to be stressful. OpenSprinkler unchains you from your sprinkler or irrigation control box, enabling you to program, run, or stop zones at any time from anywhere.

entry.title: Sentri: Home monitoring and automation
entry.content: Sentri is a complete home monitoring and automation solution in one beautiful display. Sentri adapts to your home and delivers personalized alerts along with a live HD video feed straight to your smartphone, no matter where you are.
entry.summary: Sentri is a complete home monitoring and automation solution in one beautiful display. Sentri adapts to your home and delivers personalized alerts along with a live HD video feed straight to your smartphone, no matter where you are.

entry.title: Hue Lux: Connected bulbs
entry.content: Simple and smart, hue lux bulbs produce beautiful warm white light that can be brightened and dimmed to suit any occasion.
entry.summary: Simple and smart, hue lux bulbs produce beautiful warm white light that can be brightened and dimmed to suit any occasion.

entry.title: Refuel: Smart propane tank gauge
entry.content: Nothing ends a cookout faster than an empty propane tank. Instead of guessing how much gas you’ve got left, use this smart propane tank gauge to find out your exact propane level. Now you’ll never get caught off guard again.
entry.summary: Nothing ends a cookout faster than an empty propane tank. Instead of guessing how much gas you’ve got left, use this smart propane tank gauge to find out your exact propane level. Now you’ll never get caught off guard again.

entry.title: Sony: SmartWatch 3
entry.content: Even without your smartphone, SmartWatch 3 SWR50 is a fun and useful accessory. You can fill it with music to take with you if you’re going for a run. When you’re out, you can track your activity and movements as well as sync with your Lifelog when you come home.
entry.summary: Even without your smartphone, SmartWatch 3 SWR50 is a fun and useful accessory. You can fill it with music to take with you if you’re going for a run. When you’re out, you can track your activity and movements as well as sync with your Lifelog when you come home.

entry.title: Outlink: Smart outlet
entry.content: Keep an eye on power-hungry appliances from anywhere with Outlink. Its got a smart outlet, which tracks energy usage and can be turned on/off remotely.
entry.summary: Keep an eye on power-hungry appliances from anywhere with Outlink. Its got a smart outlet, which tracks energy usage and can be turned on/off remotely.

entry.title: Smappee: Smart home energy manager
entry.content: Detect abnormal consumption immediately. And if you’re not sure whether you disconnected a certain device, you can check via Smappee and even turn it off remotely.
entry.summary: Detect abnormal consumption immediately. And if you’re not sure whether you disconnected a certain device, you can check via Smappee and even turn it off remotely.

entry.title: Mr. Coffee: Smart coffeemaker
entry.content: Enabled with WeMo, the Mr. Coffee 10-Cup Smart Optimal Brew Coffeemaker makes it easy to schedule, monitor, and modify your brew from anywhere. Sleep in a little longer by setting up a brewing schedule in advance.
entry.summary: Enabled with WeMo, the Mr. Coffee 10-Cup Smart Optimal Brew Coffeemaker makes it easy to schedule, monitor, and modify your brew from anywhere. Sleep in a little longer by setting up a brewing schedule in advance.

entry.title: Norm: Connected thermostat
entry.content: Use Norm to tailor your home’s temperature exactly to your liking and control your climate from anywhere. It offers intelligence, convenience, and efficiency, so don’t just call it a thermostat—Norm is your home’s sixth sense.
entry.summary: Use Norm to tailor your home’s temperature exactly to your liking and control your climate from anywhere. It offers intelligence, convenience, and efficiency, so don’t just call it a thermostat—Norm is your home’s sixth sense.

entry.title: Honeywell: Wifi smart thermostat
entry.content: Adjust your thermostat from anywhere and take comfort in knowing that from now on your home will always feel just right.
entry.summary: Adjust your thermostat from anywhere and take comfort in knowing that from now on your home will always feel just right.

entry.title: LiftMaster: MyQ connected garage door
entry.content: Imagine receiving an alert if you left your garage open. Or being able to turn on your lights before you got home. LiftMaster MyQ Technology does this by letting you monitor, open and close your garage door or gate and control your home lighting from anywhere - all from your smartphone.
entry.summary: Imagine receiving an alert if you left your garage open. Or being able to turn on your lights before you got home. LiftMaster MyQ Technology does this by letting you monitor, open and close your garage door or gate and control your home lighting from anywhere - all from your smartphone.

entry.title: Blossom: Smart watering controller
entry.content: Automate your sprinklers with real-time weather data and complete control from your phone to lower your water bill up to 30%.
entry.summary: Automate your sprinklers with real-time weather data and complete control from your phone to lower your water bill up to 30%.

entry.title: Serena: Motorized shades
entry.content: Serena motorized shades give you instant access to your window treatments so you can control privacy and adjust natural light with the touch of a button.
entry.summary: Serena motorized shades give you instant access to your window treatments so you can control privacy and adjust natural light with the touch of a button.

entry.title: Insteon Hub: Home controller for Insteon devices
entry.content: Insteon hub is a controller for Insteon light bulbs, wall switches, outlets, and thermostats at home or remotely and receive instant email or text message alerts from motion, door and window, water leak, and smoke sensors while you’re away.
entry.summary: Insteon hub is a controller for Insteon light bulbs, wall switches, outlets, and thermostats at home or remotely and receive instant email or text message alerts from motion, door and window, water leak, and smoke sensors while you’re away.

entry.title: Flip 2: Wearable for kids
entry.content: Wearable phone and locator for kids. Parents can call, text and locate their child right from their phone, giving kids the freedom to be kids and parents a little extra peace of mind.
entry.summary: Wearable phone and locator for kids. Parents can call, text and locate their child right from their phone, giving kids the freedom to be kids and parents a little extra peace of mind.

entry.title: Tripper: Window and door sensor
entry.content: Don’t bother with a costly home security system. Tripper is a set of two sensors that sends you real-time alerts when the status of any door, window, or cabinet in your home changes.
entry.summary: Don’t bother with a costly home security system. Tripper is a set of two sensors that sends you real-time alerts when the status of any door, window, or cabinet in your home changes.

entry.title: Onecue: Gesture control for your home
entry.content: Onecue is a device that connects and controls your media and smart home devices using simple touch-free gestures.
entry.summary: Onecue is a device that connects and controls your media and smart home devices using simple touch-free gestures.

entry.title: Tapt: Smart light switch
entry.content: Tapt replaces your basic single-pole wall switch with two smart switches that give you one-touch control over all sorts of things, including smart bulbs that have been manually turned off.
entry.summary: Tapt replaces your basic single-pole wall switch with two smart switches that give you one-touch control over all sorts of things, including smart bulbs that have been manually turned off.

entry.title: Garmin Vivosmart: Fitness band and smartwatch
entry.content: Vívosmart follows your progress 24/7 and can stay on for up to 7 days, before the battery needs a charge. Use the built-in alarm and vívosmart will alert you with a gentle vibration – no noise to disturb anyone else. Set the sleep mode at bedtime and monitor your rest.
entry.summary: Vívosmart follows your progress 24/7 and can stay on for up to 7 days, before the battery needs a charge. Use the built-in alarm and vívosmart will alert you with a gentle vibration – no noise to disturb anyone else. Set the sleep mode at bedtime and monitor your rest.

entry.title: Garageio: Connected garage door
entry.content: Garageio is the simple and secure way to control and monitor your garage door from anywhere in the world, without replacing your existing garage door opener. No more turning around to make sure your garage door is closed.
entry.summary: Garageio is the simple and secure way to control and monitor your garage door from anywhere in the world, without replacing your existing garage door opener. No more turning around to make sure your garage door is closed.

entry.title: Thingsee One: Smart developer device
entry.content: We change the way the Internet of Things is built. Start exploring straight out of box with our mobile app and go deeper with the SDK.
entry.summary: We change the way the Internet of Things is built. Start exploring straight out of box with our mobile app and go deeper with the SDK.

entry.title: Flow: Intuitive wireless controller
entry.content: Flow is a programmable shortcut to your favorite actions.
entry.summary: Flow is a programmable shortcut to your favorite actions.

entry.title: Wink Relay: Touchscreen home controller
entry.content: Relay is a touchscreen that’s tailored to you. It runs the Wink app, so you can manage all your favorite smart products from one central location. It’s bold, it’s brainy, it’s beautiful. It’s an entire smart home on your wall.
entry.summary: Relay is a touchscreen that’s tailored to you. It runs the Wink app, so you can manage all your favorite smart products from one central location. It’s bold, it’s brainy, it’s beautiful. It’s an entire smart home on your wall.

entry.title: Flic: Wireless smart button
entry.content: The wireless bluetooth button that creates a shortcut to your favorite actions on your phone. With one Flic, you can create a shortcut to call a cab, text your loved ones of your location if you’re in distress, or just turn the lights on.
entry.summary: The wireless bluetooth button that creates a shortcut to your favorite actions on your phone. With one Flic, you can create a shortcut to call a cab, text your loved ones of your location if you’re in distress, or just turn the lights on.

entry.title: Arlo: Smart home security camera system
entry.content: The world's first and only 100% wire-free HD weatherproof security camera. No cords. No wires. No worries.
entry.summary: The world's first and only 100% wire-free HD weatherproof security camera. No cords. No wires. No worries.

entry.title: Brio: Smartest power outlet
entry.content: Brio is a safe, smart, and bold new electrical outlet that takes the place of old and potentially dangerous outlet technology.
entry.summary: Brio is a safe, smart, and bold new electrical outlet that takes the place of old and potentially dangerous outlet technology.

entry.title: NUZii: The World's First All-In-One Smart Life Device
entry.content: Manage your smart home, store your files on the cloud, stream your music and secure your internet from anywhere in a new, smarter way.
entry.summary: Manage your smart home, store your files on the cloud, stream your music and secure your internet from anywhere in a new, smarter way.

entry.title: Withings Activité: Activity tracker
entry.content: Withings Activité is the new generation Swiss Made watch, combining time and activity tracking. Activité fuels your healthy motivation by tracking all your movements, keeping you informed at all times and supporting your efforts - until you reach your goal.
entry.summary: Withings Activité is the new generation Swiss Made watch, combining time and activity tracking. Activité fuels your healthy motivation by tracking all your movements, keeping you informed at all times and supporting your efforts - until you reach your goal.

entry.title: Dropcam: Connected camera
entry.content: Even when you're miles away, keep an eye on your home, kids and mischievous pets in beautiful HD with Dropcam.
entry.summary: Even when you're miles away, keep an eye on your home, kids and mischievous pets in beautiful HD with Dropcam.

entry.title: Roost: Smart Battery
entry.content: Smarten your smoke alarms with Roost. Roost smart battery delivers notifications to you wherever you are. This is not your average 9V battery.
entry.summary: Smarten your smoke alarms with Roost. Roost smart battery delivers notifications to you wherever you are. This is not your average 9V battery.

entry.title: Mimo: Smart baby monitoring
entry.content: Stay connected with the Mimo Baby Monitor. Get real-time audio and insights about your baby’s sleep activity, right on your smart device, from anywhere in the world.
entry.summary: Stay connected with the Mimo Baby Monitor. Get real-time audio and insights about your baby’s sleep activity, right on your smart device, from anywhere in the world.

entry.title: Nexus: Player
entry.content: Nexus Player, bringing apps, games, and content to your TV.
entry.summary: Nexus Player, bringing apps, games, and content to your TV.

entry.title: UP3: Health tracker
entry.content: UP3 is packed with state-of-the-art sensors that give you the full picture of your health. Heart Health Sensor measures resting heart rate - a leading indicator of your overall health and fitness level.
entry.summary: UP3 is packed with state-of-the-art sensors that give you the full picture of your health. Heart Health Sensor measures resting heart rate - a leading indicator of your overall health and fitness level.

entry.title: TAH: Bluetooth device for internet of things
entry.content: Lego blocks for the internet of things. It is now easier than ever to connect your smart devices to everything around you with Tah!
entry.summary: Lego blocks for the internet of things. It is now easier than ever to connect your smart devices to everything around you with Tah!

entry.title: SerraView: Smart Daylighters
entry.content: SerraView Smart Daylighters harvests daylight from outside, reduce glare, and redirect the daylight so it can illuminate the entire room—all while preserving your view out the window.
entry.summary: SerraView Smart Daylighters harvests daylight from outside, reduce glare, and redirect the daylight so it can illuminate the entire room—all while preserving your view out the window.

entry.title: Evermind: Connected home care
entry.content: Evermind provides peace of mind to those who live alone, or who need extra support, and the people who care about them.
entry.summary: Evermind provides peace of mind to those who live alone, or who need extra support, and the people who care about them.

entry.title: Onyx : Wearable communication device
entry.content: Onyx is the first wearable of its kind, putting the power of group communication at your fingertips in a small, stylish device. Collaborate beautifully anywhere you have a data connection - across the street or around the world.
entry.summary: Onyx is the first wearable of its kind, putting the power of group communication at your fingertips in a small, stylish device. Collaborate beautifully anywhere you have a data connection - across the street or around the world.

entry.title: BeON: Stress-free home security
entry.content: The BeON Burglar Deterrent system installs just like normal light bulbs and works with your existing wall switches, but when you insert the modules it brings a whole host of new capabilities to all of these great locations throughout your home.
entry.summary: The BeON Burglar Deterrent system installs just like normal light bulbs and works with your existing wall switches, but when you insert the modules it brings a whole host of new capabilities to all of these great locations throughout your home.

entry.title: Echo: Voice powered home assistant
entry.content: Amazon Echo is designed around your voice. It's always on—just ask for information, music, news, weather, and more.
entry.summary: Amazon Echo is designed around your voice. It's always on—just ask for information, music, news, weather, and more.

entry.title: Cocoon: Smart & simple home security
entry.content: One Cocoon can protect your whole home by sensing activity through walls and doors, keeping you safe.
entry.summary: One Cocoon can protect your whole home by sensing activity through walls and doors, keeping you safe.

entry.title: Point: A softer take on home security
entry.content: Point is a smart house sitter. It listens to the sounds of your home, senses what's in the air and lets you know if anything is wrong.
entry.summary: Point is a smart house sitter. It listens to the sounds of your home, senses what's in the air and lets you know if anything is wrong.

entry.title: Homeboy: Accessible home security system
entry.content: Homeboy attaches magnetically, lasts for 3 months on a single charge, and automatically alerts you when motion is detected. The future of security is here. Get Homeboy today.
entry.summary: Homeboy attaches magnetically, lasts for 3 months on a single charge, and automatically alerts you when motion is detected. The future of security is here. Get Homeboy today.

entry.title: ShutterEaze: Automate your plantation shutters
entry.content: ShutterEaze makes it easy for anyone to add remote control functionality and automate their existing interior plantation shutters.
entry.summary: ShutterEaze makes it easy for anyone to add remote control functionality and automate their existing interior plantation shutters.

entry.title: Maid: Smart Microwave Oven
entry.content: Maid is a smart microwave oven that knows what to cook and how. Maid is connected to a sizable recipe store in the internet and can lead you through them. Maid also learns your calorie requirements and delivers personalized recipe suggestions.
entry.summary: Maid is a smart microwave oven that knows what to cook and how. Maid is connected to a sizable recipe store in the internet and can lead you through them. Maid also learns your calorie requirements and delivers personalized recipe suggestions.

entry.title: Leeo: Nightlight with superpowers
entry.content: They’re great at sniffing out smoke, but they’re only useful to the people who can hear them. If you’re away from home, your smoke alarms can’t tell you if your home is safe from fire.
entry.summary: They’re great at sniffing out smoke, but they’re only useful to the people who can hear them. If you’re away from home, your smoke alarms can’t tell you if your home is safe from fire.

entry.title: Hendo: A real hoverboard
entry.content: Hendo is introducing the world's first REAL hoverboard and hover developer kit. We are putting hover technology in your hands.
entry.summary: Hendo is introducing the world's first REAL hoverboard and hover developer kit. We are putting hover technology in your hands.

entry.title: Bluesmart: Connected carry-On
entry.content: Lock, weigh and track your Bluesmart carry-on with your phone. Also recharge your devices.
entry.summary: Lock, weigh and track your Bluesmart carry-on with your phone. Also recharge your devices.

entry.title: iRobot Mirra: Pool cleaning robot
entry.content: Designed for any type of in-ground pool, the iRobot Mirra 530 Pool Cleaning Robot deep cleans pool's surfaces and water for you, without using the pool's filtration system, hoses or booster pumps.
entry.summary: Designed for any type of in-ground pool, the iRobot Mirra 530 Pool Cleaning Robot deep cleans pool's surfaces and water for you, without using the pool's filtration system, hoses or booster pumps.

entry.title: Rejiva: Monitors your total health
entry.content: The only wearable health device that thinks like a doctor.
entry.summary: The only wearable health device that thinks like a doctor.

entry.title: Kibbi: IoT home security solution
entry.content: Smart security at a smart price. Kibbi provides protection for your entire home.
entry.summary: Smart security at a smart price. Kibbi provides protection for your entire home.

entry.title: Skydrop: Revolutionary sprinkler controller
entry.content: The skydrop controller is built with the planet, and you, in mind. It is designed to not only save water, but to save you money.
entry.summary: The skydrop controller is built with the planet, and you, in mind. It is designed to not only save water, but to save you money.

entry.title: Ambi Climate: Smart add-on for your air conditioner
entry.content: Ambi Climate is a small, sleek internet of things device that makes your existing infrared remote-controlled air conditioner smart. It allows you to sync your AC with your smartphone, giving you complete access to monitor and control your air conditioner wherever you are.
entry.summary: Ambi Climate is a small, sleek internet of things device that makes your existing infrared remote-controlled air conditioner smart. It allows you to sync your AC with your smartphone, giving you complete access to monitor and control your air conditioner wherever you are.

entry.title: MaxMyTV: Home automation on your TV
entry.content: Android based MaxMyTV Smart Hub automates your home and Overlays alerts from Sensors, IP camera and Social Media on TV broadcast video.
entry.summary: Android based MaxMyTV Smart Hub automates your home and Overlays alerts from Sensors, IP camera and Social Media on TV broadcast video.

entry.title: MOTA SmartRing: Connectivity at your fingertips
entry.content: MOTA SmartRing keeps you connected with who and what matter most. Calls, texts, email and social networking in style.
entry.summary: MOTA SmartRing keeps you connected with who and what matter most. Calls, texts, email and social networking in style.

entry.title: Olive: Intelligent bracelet that helps you manage stress
entry.content: Olive is putting science and technology to work for you. It analyzes your patterns and biological indicators, helps you be aware of when your body experiences a stress response, and empowers you with a range of exercises that can be used to bring your body back into balance.
entry.summary: Olive is putting science and technology to work for you. It analyzes your patterns and biological indicators, helps you be aware of when your body experiences a stress response, and empowers you with a range of exercises that can be used to bring your body back into balance.

entry.title: FitBark: Activity tracking for your pet
entry.content: Dogs can’t talk and don’t carry a smartphone. FitBark is a tiny, smart activity monitor that helps you understand your dog’s health and behavior in a way that was never available before.
entry.summary: Dogs can’t talk and don’t carry a smartphone. FitBark is a tiny, smart activity monitor that helps you understand your dog’s health and behavior in a way that was never available before.

entry.title: SmartMat: Intelligent yoga mat
entry.content: A portable, responsive yoga mat giving you the flexibility to start or advance your yoga practice.
entry.summary: A portable, responsive yoga mat giving you the flexibility to start or advance your yoga practice.

entry.title: Highfive: Video conferencing you can actually love
entry.content: Highfive is beautifully simple video conferencing for everyone, in every room, on every device.
entry.summary: Highfive is beautifully simple video conferencing for everyone, in every room, on every device.

entry.title: Waves: Connected lava lamp
entry.content: Waves is a calming, automatic, and soothing artistic gadget for your home, office, and gift giving. A modern take on the Lava Lamp using IOT tech

entry.title: Wink: Connected home LED light bulb
entry.content: GE Link bulbs connect to the Wink app, allowing you to control your lighting from anywhere. Remotely operate lights from your smartphone or automate them to fit your schedule. Even smarter, GE Link lighting is energy efficient; these use 80% less power than traditional bulbs. Plus they have a pretty funny ad.
entry.summary: GE Link bulbs connect to the Wink app, allowing you to control your lighting from anywhere. Remotely operate lights from your smartphone or automate them to fit your schedule. Even smarter, GE Link lighting is energy efficient; these use 80% less power than traditional bulbs. Plus they have a pretty funny ad.

entry.title: iBaby Monitor: Digital video monitor with night vision
entry.content: The iBaby Monitor M2 from iHealth is as mobile as your baby. Thanks to the magnetic base and rechargeable battery you can shift the camera to whatever room your baby is in for up to two hours. It also offers two-way audio, so you can communicate with your baby—no external speakers required.
entry.summary: The iBaby Monitor M2 from iHealth is as mobile as your baby. Thanks to the magnetic base and rechargeable battery you can shift the camera to whatever room your baby is in for up to two hours. It also offers two-way audio, so you can communicate with your baby—no external speakers required.

entry.title: Rico: Turn your smartphone into a smarthome device
entry.content: Rico is the world’s first smart-home security device that uses your spare smartphone as its brain and eyes. It has a very cool robot design as well.
entry.summary: Rico is the world’s first smart-home security device that uses your spare smartphone as its brain and eyes. It has a very cool robot design as well.

entry.title: Notion: Home intelligence sensors
entry.content: Home intelligence is a concept that hasn’t been possible until now. For years, security systems have only detected things like doors opening, windows breaking or alarms going off. These alerts only skim the surface of what Notion is capable of.
entry.summary: Home intelligence is a concept that hasn’t been possible until now. For years, security systems have only detected things like doors opening, windows breaking or alarms going off. These alerts only skim the surface of what Notion is capable of.

entry.title: Ring: Smart doorbell with video
entry.content: See who’s there, from anywhere. With wide angled HD video, smart motion detection, and cloud recording, it’s like you’re home even when you’re not.
entry.summary: See who’s there, from anywhere. With wide angled HD video, smart motion detection, and cloud recording, it’s like you’re home even when you’re not.

entry.title: Hue Tap: Wireless smart switch
entry.content: Here’s hue tap, the world's first wireless smart switch. Now control your hue lights in your home with just the push of a button. And there are four to choose from. One for a favorite scene. One for a light recipe. Or just one to switch some lights off. It’s all up to you.
entry.summary: Here’s hue tap, the world's first wireless smart switch. Now control your hue lights in your home with just the push of a button. And there are four to choose from. One for a favorite scene. One for a light recipe. Or just one to switch some lights off. It’s all up to you.

entry.title: Wink Relay: Home automation wall control
entry.content: Get instant access to your connected home on a touchscreen that’s tailored to you. It’s bold, it’s brainy, it’s beautiful. It’s an entire smart home on your wall.
entry.summary: Get instant access to your connected home on a touchscreen that’s tailored to you. It’s bold, it’s brainy, it’s beautiful. It’s an entire smart home on your wall.

entry.content: Transform your tracker into a chic accessory for work, weekend or evening. Tory Burch and Fitbit have teamed to create fashionable wearables.
entry.summary: Transform your tracker into a chic accessory for work, weekend or evening. Tory Burch and Fitbit have teamed to create fashionable wearables.

entry.title: Tilt: Automate your blinds with a smart control kit
entry.content: The easy, affordable, attractive way to remotely control your blinds. Without the ridiculous expense or complexity of home automation systems.

entry.title: Harmony Living Home: Home automation controller
entry.content: Create personalized home activities and enjoy integrated control of connected lights, locks, thermostats, sensors, home entertainment and more with the latest in Harmony home automation.
entry.summary: Create personalized home activities and enjoy integrated control of connected lights, locks, thermostats, sensors, home entertainment and more with the latest in Harmony home automation.

entry.title: ecobee: The smarter wi-fi thermostat
entry.content: Ordinary thermostats read the temperature in only one room, but are supposed to deliver comfort in all rooms. ecobee3 remote sensors deliver the right temperature in the rooms that matter most.

entry.title: Cloud Your Car: Fleet managment for small businesses
entry.content: Meet Cloud Your Car. The simplest and the most affordable fleet management solution yet.
entry.summary: Meet Cloud Your Car. The simplest and the most affordable fleet management solution yet.

entry.title: CHUI: Intelligent doorbell with facial recognition
entry.content: Chui is a smart camera that makes your home socially intelligent. Chui can be used as a doorbell as well as a security and monitoring device inside your house.
entry.summary: Chui is a smart camera that makes your home socially intelligent. Chui can be used as a doorbell as well as a security and monitoring device inside your house.

entry.title: EO1: Connected art screen
entry.content: Electric Objects brings the beauty of the Internet into your home. There's more art on the Internet than in every gallery and museum on Earth. But many of these beautiful objects are trapped. They’re trapped inside of devices like our phones, our tablets, our TVs, our laptops — devices designed for distraction, living between texts, tweets, football games and emails from work.
entry.summary: Electric Objects brings the beauty of the Internet into your home. There's more art on the Internet than in every gallery and museum on Earth. But many of these beautiful objects are trapped. They’re trapped inside of devices like our phones, our tablets, our TVs, our laptops — devices designed for distraction, living between texts, tweets, football games and emails from work.

entry.title: Aura: Enrich your sleep experience
entry.content: Withings Aura is a well thought-out active system designed to both monitor and improve sleep quality. Our technology combines a contact-free Sleep Sensor tucked under the mattress, an active light & sound Bedside Device, and a smartphone app.
entry.summary: Withings Aura is a well thought-out active system designed to both monitor and improve sleep quality. Our technology combines a contact-free Sleep Sensor tucked under the mattress, an active light & sound Bedside Device, and a smartphone app.

entry.title: Moxie: Showerhead with wireless speaker
entry.content: Your music. Your shower. Your time. To chill out. To sing. Refresh. Energize. Escape. The Moxie showerhead + wireless speaker delivers up to 7 hours of music, news and more by pairing wirelessly with your device enabled with Bluetooth® technology. Just you + water + clean, clear sound.

entry.title: Hydrawise: WiFi Irrigation Controller with predictive watering
entry.content: Control and monitor your sprinkler system from anywhere in the world using your web browser or our iPhone and Android apps. Use Hydrawise Predictive Watering to adjust your watering schedules based on temperature, rainfall, humidity or wind speed. Our cloud based architecture means you don’t need to perform any complicated port forwarding on your router or expose your system to security risks to be able to control your irrigation from anywhere in the world.
entry.summary: Control and monitor your sprinkler system from anywhere in the world using your web browser or our iPhone and Android apps. Use Hydrawise Predictive Watering to adjust your watering schedules based on temperature, rainfall, humidity or wind speed. Our cloud based architecture means you don’t need to perform any complicated port forwarding on your router or expose your system to security risks to be able to control your irrigation from anywhere in the world.
